Gordon Mohr writes:
> The released 1.5 still gives the same sort of stack-dump error-stacks?

Yup.

> What kernel/distro are you using?

Gentoo 2004.2 with the gentoo-dev SMP kernel, which I believe is 2.6.3.

Using the released JDK from Sun.
